resources.string: Indtast venligst et navn p√• en launcher
Dette fjerner blot ikonet for startprogrammet fra dette gitter, men afinstallerer ikke selve appen.
Luk denne app ved at starte en anden app
Can I make this app the default launcher?
Nope, you cannot as this is just a basic app icon holder. For a real home screen launcher get our other app Simple Launcher.
